entry.title: 1/2 Gallon Premium Blue & White Mixed Indicating Silica Gel Beads(Industry Standard 2-4 mm) - 3.6 LBS Reusable
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dry & Dry
Type:
Price: 19.99

30 Year Experience in the Industry for Silica Gel Desiccant - Premium Quality(See Our Customers' Reviews)

"High Quality Mixed Blue & White Indicating Silica Desiccant" 

  • Contains 90% of White Beads and 10% Blue Beads.
  • Half Gallon Volume of Fresh Mixed Blue & White High Quality Silica Gel Beads(Approx 3.6 lbs)
  • Silica Gel Beads Size : about 2 ~ 4 mm
  • Indicating Silica Gel will turn Blue to Pink when 50-60% absorbed with moisture. Still almost half more capacity left to absorb moisture even after color change.
  • Blue Beads contain "COBALT CHLORIDE" which may pose health risk and environmental issues. Our blue beads contain less than 0.3% cobalt chloride
  • Beads can be Reactivated by Placing in the Oven for 0.5-2 hours at 200-250F Or Microwave for About 10 Minutes at DEFROST. Don't use over 250F in the Oven. Depending on beads' condition, they may take shorter than the recommended time. Please check the beads' color periodically.
  • NOT FOR FOOD 
  • GOOD FOR Air Compressors, Paint Booths, Gun Moisture Control, 3D Filament, Drying Woods, Desiccant Drying Air Compressor, Gun Safe and Tank Dries

Free Shipping

  • Silica Gel Beads Size : about 2 ~ 4 mm
  • Blue beads turn from Dark Blue to Light Pink when absorb moisture and saturated.
  • Blue Beads contain "COBALT CHLORIDE" which may pose health risk and environmental issues. Our blue beads contain less than 0.3% cobalt chloride
  • Beads can be Reactivated by Placing in the Oven for 0.5-2 hours at 200-250F Or Microwave for About 10 Minutes at DEFROST. Don't use over 250F in the Oven. Depending on beads' condition, they may take shorter than the recommended time. Please check the beads' color periodically.
  • NOT FOR FOOD 
  • GOOD FOR Air Compressors, Paint Booths, Gun Moisture Control, 3D Filament, Drying Woods, Desiccant Drying Air Compressor, Gun Safe and Tank Dries
